item.title: Do you know Java: Decorate your code
item.description: You do not need comments to decorate your code minimally. Many years back then comments were the ultimate tool to decorate our code. And as it happened many times, sotware engineers glady used it to place ascii arts around their hotfixes or just simple seperate their solutions. In this post I would like to show you a funny feature of operators which you can use to draw lines or more.
